author: hoju
msg: correct jar manifest info.  We were adding a trailing "/" to the "Name" attribute which is incorrect. Also corrected "Implementation-Title" to be the dot package notation rather than an arbitrary name (following Xalan's example).  Added a "Comment" attribute to each jar as well.

author: hoju
msg: Changes allowing things to build normally in the presence of the new chainsaw stuff.  If one wants to build chainsaw and it associated libraries, then use chainsaw-build.xml.  Also allowed for one to override properties using properties files in $user.home.  See property file includes at the top of build.xml for info.  Also added build.* property options to build.properties.sample to be used by javac.

author: psmith
msg: Updated the list of Hotkeys for the help screen.

author: psmith
msg: Slowly expanding the list of Hotkeys, by moving towards a more Action

msg: Fixed filesave menu and description on welcome page.
